resources.string: Make-A-Cake ltd. brings you the best in cake baking with a fun twist. Our app lets you create your own custom cakes and have them delivered to your doorstep! Ships anywhere within our Solar System!
This way you can order a perfect cake for any occasion; birthday parties and other celebrations, corporate events and promotions, or simply because you\'re craving a cake for the weekend.

At Make-A-Cake ltd., everything is made from scratch in house and with locally sourced ingredients when possible. Every cake is made fresh daily on the premises using the finest ingredients, including fresh butter and cream from quality local producers, pure whole vanilla beans, Belgian chocolate, and fresh seasonal produce from local farms.
The Make-A-Cake shop is not a retail bakery. We are by order only.
All of us at Make-A-Cake thank you for supporting an independent, locally owned business! We hope to hear from you soon!
Q: How do I customize my cake order?

A:From the Main Menu of the Make-A-Cake app, tap the \"Build a Cake\" button, and select the on-screen options that suit your needs for your cake order. When you\'re done designing your cake, tap the \"Confirm\" button which will take you to your Order Details. Here, you can fill in your delivery information, review and/or delete your order. If you want to order more than one cake, tap the \"Add Another Cake\" button. When you\'re satisfied with your order, tap the \"Confirm\" button and your order will be sent to us.
Q: What are the serving sizes for your products?
A: Small cake: 25 cm in diameter, Medium cake: 30 cm in diameter, Large cake: 35 cm in diameter.
Q: How much does a custom cake cost and how long does it take to make it?

A: It\'s tough to provide a general answer for that question. Cake prices depend on their size and the detail (toppings, inscriptions) involved. As the size and detail requested goes up, so do the number of hours involved in making the cake(s).
Q: What ingredients do you use?

A: Make-A-Cake only uses the best ingredients – we bake everything from scratch, don’t use any preservatives, use real vanilla and premium chocolate. We also made sure that the fruits, eggs, and milk we use for our cakes comes from trusted local farms.
Q: How long will my cake last?
A: We recommend eating your cake the day you purchase it. But if you need to store it in the refrigerator, it should stay moist for up to 3 days. And frozen cakes can be saved for up to a year!
Q: I have food allergies or I don\'t consume eggs and/or dairy. Does Make-A-Cake make anything wheat/dairy/nut free?

A: Yes! We made sure to cover the needs of any cake lover that wishes to order from us. We can use substitutes for many products we use for cake baking. When you\'re designing your custom cake in our app, make sure to select the options that will let us know about your food allergies or food preferences. However, we must tell you that we do not bake in an allergen-free environment. While we do have select products that do not contain wheat or nuts, all of our products are baked in an environment where wheat, milk, peanuts, tree nuts, eggs and soy may be present in high volumes. Due to the presence of these allergens at our baking facility, we are obliged to inform you that there might be a chance of the cakes still containing traces of eggs, milk and nuts even if we used subtitute ingredients.
Q: Do you do same-day shipping?

A: At Make-A-Cake, everything is made fresh from scratch using the finest ingredients. Since we bake to order, we cannot ship same day. All orders placed before 2:00 PM will be processed the next day to ship the following business day.
Q: How far in advance should I place my order?

A: We recommend that you place your order at least 48 hours in advance. While we can usually accommodate most orders, the more notice you give us the more likely we will be able to fulfill your order.
Q: How can I cancel my order?
A: Orders must be cancelled more than 24 hours of the preferred delivery date and before 2:00 PM on that day. Please call 123–4567–890 so that we may assist you with your request.
Q: What happens if I’m not home to receive my delivery?

A: While Make-A-Cake does not require a signature for your delivery, we can only guarantee the quality of our product if it is received by the customer at the time of delivery. Our delivery driver will only leave the package at a recipient’s door, or other secure location, if the driver believes it is safe and reasonable to do so. For this reason, it is also necessary for customers to notify a gift recipient of their sweet surprise before the date of delivery.
Q: What if I am not satisfied with my order?

A: If there is a problem with an order you received, please call 123–4567–890 or email us at makeacake@email.com. Refunds may not be given for shipping delays caused by inclement weather, package refusal, and/or incomplete or incorrect delivery address.
Tap and hold to delete a cake from the list.
You must order at least one cake.
